# @kustomer/apps-server-sdk

a Javascript/Typescript SDK for building KApps

## Install

```bash
$: npm i @kustomer/apps-server-sdk
```

## Development

### Build

```bash
$: npm run build
```

### Run Tests

```bash
$: npm test
```

### Run Lint

Lint will run lint / prettier rules

```bash
$: npm run lint
$: npm run lint:fix
```
